front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Pad Mounted Equipment - Enclosure Integrity
front.abstract: Conformance tests and requirements for the integrity of above grade pad-mounted enclosures that contain apparatus energized in excess of 600 volts and that may be exposed to the public including, but not limited to, the following types of equipment enclosures: pad-mounted capacitors or inductors, pad-mounted distribution transformers, pad-mounted junction enclosures, pad-mounted metering equipment, pad-mounted switchgear, and pad-mounted voltage regulators are covered.
